publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3912 Mr Andy Kerr: The Draft Water Undertakings (Rateable Values) (Scotland) Order 2003-That the Local Government Committee, in consideration of the draft Water Undertakings (Rateable Values) (Scotland) Order 2003, recommends that the Order be approved. Supported by: Peter Peacock*

S1M-3912 Mr Andy Kerr: The Draft Water Undertakings (Rateable Values) (Scotland) Order 2003-That the Local Government Committee, in consideration of the draft Water Undertakings (Rateable Values) (Scotland) Order 2003, recommends that the Order be approved. Supported by: Peter Peacock
